name: CS-178
body:
### Cellular Automata Encryption. About CA and CA30, CA45, CA110 here.
Link to this article: http://www.technologyreview.com/view/426536/encrypting-pictures-using-chaotic-cellular-automata/ ### User Guide Explain how to use GUI here. ### Try it out! Try it out for yourself here.
